metadata.title: CVE-2020-28919 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A stored cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Checkmk 1.6.0x priorto 1.6.0p19 allows an authenticated remote attacker to inject arbitraryJavaScript via a javascript: URL in a view title.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
